opponent.label: Megumin
opponent.from: KonoSuba: God's Blessing on this Wonderful World!
opponent.description: Megumin is an Arch Wizard of the Crimson Demon Clan with chuunibyou tendencies, and is the first person to join Kazuma's party. She is a self-proclaimed master of explosion magic, and has an equally explosive personality!

epilogue.hint: Play a game against Megumin as a female player.
